docs.snippet: GERSH--Edward. Our beloved husband/father died peacefully on Father's Day, Sunday June 15, 2014. He is survived by his wife Holli Gersh, his children: Esther Greenhaus, Laurie Gersh Roxanne Gersh, Kevin Gersh, Heather Greenberg; his brother Gabrie...
docs.lead_paragraph: GERSH--Edward. Our beloved husband/father died peacefully on Father's Day, Sunday June 15, 2014. He is survived by his wife Holli Gersh, his children: Esther Greenhaus, Laurie Gersh Roxanne Gersh, Kevin Gersh, Heather Greenberg; his brother Gabriel Gersh; his eight grandchildren, and 17 great- grandchildren. His career as an educator spanned over 70 years. He was a teacher, dean of students, college professor, and a founding member of Wilmington University. He was the founder and owner of West Hills Day Camp in Huntington, NY. His athletic career included all scholastic varsity football player as well as the 1943 Golden Gloves heavyweight open boxing champion. He both managed and promoted professional boxing. He sat on many educational boards. His dedication to the welfare of children as well as his abiding friendship to all he knew made him beloved by everyone. He will be deeply missed. Donations can be made to the "Edward I. Gersh Scholarship" at New York University and the "Edward I. Gersh Scholarship" at Wilmington University. For information call 631-427-3500.
